translations: [数] 代数的；关于代数学的

sentences.sentence: This algebraic notation of the image allows the entire image to be recreated at any time.
sentences.translation: 图像的代数标记法可以在任何时间重新创建整个图像。

sentences.sentence: They're more like algebraic variables than traditional programming variables.
sentences.translation: 它们更像是代数变量而不是传统的编程变量。

sentences.sentence: It's just an algebraic game but very important when you make your calculations.
sentences.translation: 这是一个代数游戏，可是在计算中，却十分关键。
